item.dc:creator: Brit
item.content:encoded:
Commercial Inspection Details:

Focus Building Inspections evaluated a multifamily dwelling complex in Des Moines, IA on 9/8/2022 for a commercial investor.


732 19th St Des Moines, IA

Commercial Building Inspection

Photo Credit: Loopnet


732 19th St Des Moines, IA

Commercial Building Inspection

Photo Credit: Google Maps

Location:

  • 732 19th St Des Moines, IA

Occupying Business:

  • unknown

Date of Commercial Property Inspection:

  • 9/8/2022

Services Provided:

  • Property Condition Assessment (PCA) + Property Condition Report (PCR)

Commercial Building Type:

  • Multifamily dwelling complex

Size of Commercial Building:

  • 9,372 sq ft

Commercial Building Inspector:

  • Lance Coffman

Affiliations:

  • CCPIA and ASTM

Commercial Realtor

  • Jared Brundage

Who is Focus Building Inspections?

We are a commercial inspection company focusing solely on commercial properties.

At our company, we are well-versed in commercial inspections and commercial assessments. We understand that commercial properties are not just assets but also business expenses and income generators. We recognize that many clients require more than a mere building inspection report. That is why we offer professional services that help answer questions about cost-to-cure, maintenance schedules, occupancy, fire safety, evacuation, and more. These records reveal the actual cost of owning the building and provide crucial insights for investors to evaluate the property's value.

Request Your Commercial Inspection Now

Types of Clients We Serve:

  • Commercial Realtors
